label: AnimalCertificate
comment: A collection of data for a piece of written, printed or electronic matter that provides information or evidence about the identity of an animal or a batch of animals.

datatypeProperties.comment: A code specifying a type of specified certificate.

objectProperties.comment: An animal certification applicable to this animal certificate.
A sustainability assertion applicable to this agricultural certificate.
A referenced standard applicable to this agricultural certificate.
A characteristic applicable to this sustainability inspection.
